titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence in the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: Provides amounts for expenses of the House Permanent Select Committee on Intelligence for the 115th Congress.
